title: 12/29/21 DPS Hour 3 Doug Gottlieb & Rob Parker Guest Hosting
itunes:title: 12/29/21 DPS Hour 3 Doug Gottlieb & Rob Parker Guest Hosting
description:
Rob and Doug react to the passing of legendary coach and broadcaster John Madden. They explain how the Madden video game has impacted actual coaching in the modern-day NFL. The guys weigh in on the new Covid protocols in the NFL that has basically become an honors system of reporting symptoms. NFL Analyst and former scout John Middlekauff joins Rob and Doug to talk about the major NFL headlines heading into Week 17 of the season.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
